headline: Should You Forget Nvidia and Buy These 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks Instead?
summary: This trend has benefited Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) tremendously.  Should you pass on Nvidia and buy two different AI stocks instead?  Investors should consider buying shares in Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOGL) (NASDAQ: GOOG) and Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META), which are well off recently established all-time highs.
